subject: Re: tdb docs
body:
On Tue, 2007-04-10 at 09:55 -0700, Herb Lewis wrote:
> I noticed the source/tdb/docs/README is a bit out of date.
> Are there any updated docs on using tdb somewhere else or
> do we need to update this file before release?

Is the one in samba4 more up to date?
